definitions.title: vb. prevail over, overpower
definitions.body: (late; NH id.; Aramaism; Aram. [[תְּקֵיף]], tqep be strong; Nab. [[תקף]] authority; cf. Nö:ZMG xlvii (1893), 102; Sab. [[תקף]] overpower Sab Denkm:No.9.l.13; Ar. 3aqifa attain to, overtake, overpower);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf.: 3 ms. sf. [[יִתְקְפוֹ]] Ec 4:12 (Ges:§ 60 d) if one overpower him, so 3 fs. sf. [[תִּתְקְפֵ֫הוּ]] Job 14:20; 3 fs. sf. id. Job 15:24.
